segments.text: So , what do you plan to do today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a Matisse exhibition at the Museum of Modern Art . Larry and I will go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , probably . Probably you will have to wait in line if you don't have tickets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . It's very cold today.But I brought my jacket . Maybe it will be alright to wait .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The MYOMA is very popular . There will be a lot of people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry.It stands for the Museum of Modern Art . It's an acronym . M O M A MYOMA .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Do you have any suggestions for other things we should do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suggest you go to the Jewish Museum.It ' s not far from the Guggenheim , near Central Park . It is really very interesting.Also , there is a great museum of medieval European art further up north.It ' s called the Cloisters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can we get up there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But Larry says the neighborhoods in the north are dangerous .
segments.speaker: S2
